wikipedia_page.main: Marian Ursula Arkwright (1863 – March 1922) was an English composer.

link_mentions.page: List of women composers by birth date

response: * Marian Arkwright (Unattached) – composer, one of the first British women to receive a doctorate in music

link_mentions.page: List of compositions for viola: A to B

response: In 1906 the composer Marian Arkwright received a prize from The Gentlewoman for her orchestral work called The Winds of the World.The Monthly Musical Record, vol. 36 (1906),  p. 89
